ModMetaData.name: Astartes Geneseed Mod
ModMetaData.author: SpaceDorf
ModMetaData.description:
The Adeptus Terra grants your World the Honor to house a new Chapter of the Adeptus Astartes. The Geneseed of your chosen founding Chapter has been sent to you an shall arrive shortly. In the Name of the Emperor of Mankind we Name you Lord Governor of this Imperial World.
The Astartes Geneseed Mod v0.04 adds the Space Marine Geneseed Implants to the Game. The descriptions and abilities of the Implants are based on the Warhammer40k Deathwatch RPG Sourcebooks.
This Mod aims to be compatible to Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering(EPOE) and DESurgery Following Parts are added to the Game:
* An Event that grants you your first Geneseed. * The Geneseed which is used to create the Implants for your Space Marines * The 19 Implants of a Space Marine * The Geneseed Vat to create the Implants
To create and install the Implants a medicine skill of at least 15 is required. All Implants can only be created at the Geneseed Vat. True to the Warhammer40000 Lore there is no other way to gain Geneseed than to harvest it from your Space Marines. All Implants are self-healing, but cannot be removed once they are placed in a recipient. If they get destroyed, they have to be replaced.
planned - research and maintenance of the implants Lore based restrictions for creating a space marine chemicals to activate/deactivate certain implants, as in lore.
v0.00002 Included The ThingDefs for the 19 Implants A Recipe
